effect_entries.effect:
Whenever an []{type:electric}-type move hits this Pokémon, its [Speed]{mechanic:speed} rises one [stage]{mechanic:stat-modifier}, negating any other effect on it.

This ability will not take effect if this Pokémon is immune to Electric moves.  Electric moves will ignore this Pokémon's []{move:substitute}.

This effect includes non-damaging moves, i.e. []{move:thunder-wave}.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
でんきを　受けると
素早さが　あがる。

Boosts the Speed stat when it’s
hit by an Electric-type move.

Le mosse di tipo Elettro subite
fanno aumentare la Velocità.

Sube la Velocidad si le alcanza
un ataque eléctrico.

Erhöht nach einem Treffer durch
eine Elektro-Attacke die Initiative.

Augmente la Vitesse si touché
par une capacité Électrik.

でんきを　うけると
すばやさが　あがる。

Electric-type move.

par une cap. Électrik.
